# linter-fix-guide

Explain lint errors and propose fixes. Use when a junior developer needs help resolving common lint or format warnings.

## Quick Facts
- id: `linter-fix-guide--7139e17d48`
- worth_using_score: `20/100`
- source: `codex_skills`
- source_path: `/home/wolvend/.codex/skills/linter-fix-guide/SKILL.md`

## Workflow / Steps
- Summarize the lint error in plain language.
- Point to the line or pattern and the expected style.
- Provide a corrected snippet or refactor suggestion.
